item.title: Exploring the c4... compiler?
item.description: This week I found myself digging through the code of c4, an implementation of C “in four functions”, by Robert Swierczek. I remember coming across c4 when it was released ten years ago. It got me excited: hey, C in four functions, that means it’s easy to understand right?
item.author: (Thorsten Ball)

item.title: Using Syncfusion Controls in Uno Platform Application using MAUI Embedding. - Nick's .NET Travels
item.description: The Uno Platform supports many third party control libraries, such as Mapsui and LiveCharts, but sometimes there are components that you want to use that haven’t been adapted to work with Uno. For this, you can turn to .NET MAUI Embedding which allows for any .NET MAUI control to be hosted within an Uno Platform ... Read more
item.author: (Nick)

item.title: 16 years of CVE-2008-0166 - Debian OpenSSL Bug
item.description: Many DKIM setups used cryptographic keys vulnerable to the 2008 Debian OpenSSL Bug (CVE-2008-0166) in 2024.
